title: Did any YouTube video blow your mind? What was it about? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, few months ago I was just going through YouTube like any other day and found one video whose title was ‘Timelapse of the entire universe’ uploaded by melodysheep channel. The link to the video is here : TIMELAPSE OF THE ENTIRE UNIVERSE  This video is great and by the end it gave me goosebumps. You must watch this.
